attributes.additional_details: We the public also want Brexit Leavers MP's to be in charge of getting the right deal for the UK in the single market and not any Remain MP's as we feel they would water down a better deal for our country.
attributes.background:
We the EU Leavers want to be heard.
We feel that the new Prime Minister should be a Brexit Leaver and who campaigned and believes in a better Britain as we do out of the control of the EU and that person we feel would be Andrea Leadsom and not Theresa May.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
